title: Welfare Consolidation Act 2005, with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Supplementary Welfare Allowance) (Amendment) (No. 3) (Diet Supplement) 
Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations 

(Consolidated 
Supplementary Welfare Allowance) Regulations 2007 to 2023 shall be 
construed together as one and may be cited together as the Social Welfare 
(Consolidated Supplementary Welfare Allowance) Regulations 2007 to 2023. 

the Social Welfare 

and 

Rate of diet supplement

title: Welfare Consolidation Act 2005, with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: 2. Article 17 (amended by article 2 of the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
2. Article 17 (amended by article 2 of the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Supplementary Welfare Allowance) (Amendment) (No. 5) (Diet Supplement) 
Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 717 of 2022)) of the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Supplementary Welfare Allowance) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 412 of 2007) is 
amended by the substitution of the following sub-article for sub-article (4A): 

“(4A) Notwithstanding sub-article (4), in the case of a claimant who is 
in receipt of a supplement under Part 4 of these Regulations, any 
increase in the weekly rate of benefit or assistance payable to 
that claimant, as provided for— 

(a) 

by the Social Welfare Act 2023, or 

(b) by virtue of Regulations made, which commence on or 
after 27 December 2023 but before 5 January 2024, under 
the Principal Act, insofar as such Regulations relate to an 
increase in the weekly rate of benefit or assistance, 

shall not have the effect of reducing the rate of supplement below that 
which was payable before the said increase occurs.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the foregoing Regulations. 

[686] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 December, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 December, 2023. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [686]

title: Welfare Consolidation Act 2005, with the consent of the Minister for Public
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide that the 2024 budgetary increases in Social Welfare 
payments shall not have the effect of reducing the rate of diet supplement 
below that which was payable before the increase occurred. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [686] 5
